00017 #ifndef STXXL_UFSFILEBASE_HEADER

00021 #include <stxxl/bits/io/request.h>
00022 
00023 
00024 __STXXL_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00025 
00028 
00030 class ufs_file_base : public virtual file
00031 {
00032 protected:
00033     mutex fd_mutex;        // sequentialize function calls involving file_des
00034     int file_des;          // file descriptor
00035     int mode_;             // open mode
00036     const std::string filename;
00037     ufs_file_base(const std::string & filename, int mode);
00038     offset_type _size();
00039     void close();
00040 
00041 public:
00042     ~ufs_file_base();
00043     offset_type size();
00044     void set_size(offset_type newsize);
00045     void lock();
00046     const char * io_type() const;
00047     void remove();
00048 };
